title: CannaTech Conference Series: Tahira Rehmatullah, Managing Partner of Hypur Ventures, CFO of MTech Acquisition Corp
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Tahira Rehmatullah, Managing Partner of Hypur Ventures and CFO of MTech Acquisition Corp talked with Rena Sherbill about the evolution of the cannabis industry, MTech's merger with MJ Freeway, the importance of pivoting and the formality of legalization.  Learn more about your ad choices.
